net.iceball.mga.arena.team

Class TeamModifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.iceball.mga.arena.team.TeamModifier

  • public class TeamModifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Floris on 23-07-15. /////////////////////////////////////////////////// // What does this class do? // /////////////////////////////////////////////////// // This class is full with static // // methods and allows editing your team. // /////////////////////////////////////////////////

      • createTeam

        public static void createTeam(Arena arena,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              int players,
                              SpawnType spawnType,
                              int spawns)
                       throws TeamAlreadyExistException
        Creates a new team for the arena.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        name - Name of the team
        players - Maximum amount of players
        spawnType - SpawnType of Team
        spawns - Amount of spawns the player has
        Throws:
        TeamAlreadyExistException

      • setTeamSpawns

        public static void setTeamSpawns(Arena arena,
                                 Team team,
                                 org.bukkit.Location[] spawns)
        Sets a new array of spawns for the given team in the given arena. You can make the array empty, or fill it with your own values.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        team - Team that will have the new array values.
        spawns - The new values that will be set.

      • setTeamSpawn

        public static void setTeamSpawn(Arena arena,
                                org.bukkit.Location spawn,
                                Team team,
                                int number)
        Sets the Team spawn of Arena
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        spawn - The new spawnpoint
        team - Team that will have the new spawnpoint
        number - The index number of the spawn. Note: the counting starts at 1, not 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - when you give this method a stupid number.

      • setTeamSuddendeath

        public static void setTeamSuddendeath(Arena arena,
                                      Team team,
                                      boolean suddendeath)
        Sets the new value suddendeath for the given team.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        team - Team whose values are about to change ;D
        suddendeath - Whether the player is moved to the spectator team after his first death or not.

      • setTeamPlayers

        public static void setTeamPlayers(Arena arena,
                                  Team team,
                                  int players)
        Sets the new amount of players for the given team.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        team - Team with the new amount of players
        players - Max players the team can have.

        Parameters:

        team - Team with the new SpawnType
        type - Have a look at the SpawnType class

      • isTeamReady

        public static boolean isTeamReady(Team team)
        Checks if the team is ready to be used for the game.
        Parameters:
        team - Team that will be checked
        Returns:
        True when the team is ready to be saved, false when the team is missing some values.

      • teamInfo

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> teamInfo(Team team)
        Gets a list of strings that has all information about the given team
        Parameters:
        team - The given team
        Returns:
        Lots of information abou the given team

      • setTeamMainstartspawn

        public static void setTeamMainstartspawn(Arena arena,
                                         Team team,
                                         boolean mainstartspawn)
        Sets the new value of mainstartspawn of to true or false.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        team - Team that will have the new values.
        mainstartspawn - Set this to true if you want all your players to spawn at the first set location, this is handy when you have multiple spawnpoints, but don't want everyone to spawn in different locations when the status starts, but only after the start. Example: Paintball. Otherwise, set it to false.

      • setTeamPrefix

        public static void setTeamPrefix(Arena arena,
                                 Team team,
                                 java.lang.String prefix)
        Sets the new prefix of the team. Can be used in chats.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        team - Team instance
        prefix - The new prefix of the given team.

      • setTeamSuffix

        public static void setTeamSuffix(Arena arena,
                                 Team team,
                                 java.lang.String suffix)
        Sets the new suffix of the team. Can be used in chats.
        Parameters:

        team - Team instance
        suffix - The new suffix of the given team.

      • getSpawnFreeNumber

        public static int getSpawnFreeNumber(Arena arena,
                                     Team team)
        Gets the next index number used to fill the next spawn automatically.
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena instance
        team - Team that will be checked
        Returns:
        0 or the (index number + 1)
